name: nextspace-astro
title: Nextspace Astro
desc: Tailored for Architecture, Interior Design, and Creative Professionals
article:
Designed for architects, interior designers, and creatives, Nextspace is a modern Astro theme that highlights projects beautifully and efficiently with its clean aesthetic and speed.


Key Features:

  • Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4,
  • 15+ Professionally designed pages (Home, Studio, Projects, Services, Blog, Contact, etc.)
  • 99 Google PageSpeed Score
  • Sleek, minimal design with stunning visuals
  • Fully responsive and mobile-optimized layout
  • Optimized for SEO and fast-loading performance
  • Customizable design â colors, fonts, layout elements
  • Modular codebase with developer-friendly structure
  • Markdown & MDX support for easy content updates
  • Auto-imported MDX components
  • Contact form integration out of the box
  • Cross-browser compatibility
  • Google Fonts & Font Awesome integration
  • Lifetime free updates
  • Premium customer support


Unique Pages:

  1. Homepage
  2. About
  3. Terms
  4. Services
  5. Blog
  6. Privacy
  7. Reviews
  8. Blog Details
  9. FAQs
  10. Projects
  11. Gallery
  12. Contact
  13. Project Details
  14. Career
  15. Elements
  16. 404
